title: Targeted radionuclide therapy against GARP expressing T regulatory cells after tumour priming with external beam radiotherapy in a murine syngeneic model
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Pierre-Simon Bellaye, Alexandre MM. Dias, Jean-Marc Vrigneaud, Alexanne Bouchard, Mathieu Moreau, Camille Petitot, Claire Bernhard, Michael Claron, Lisa Froidurot, Véronique Morgand, Mélanie Guillemin, Marie Monterrat, Céline Mirjolet, Carmen Garrido, Evelyne Kohli, Bertrand Collin
